name: Sharp Notions, LLC
description:
At Sharp Notions, we are a growth company that specializes in making our client’s web vision come to life. Not just a marketing website, but core functionality that is essential to their business or operation.
Many of our clients are well-funded start-ups that are inspiring new and innovative business models. We are an Agile organization that offers developers the opportunity to work on challenging full-stack projects across several market segments, including fintech, medtech, higher-education and many others. Beyond the technical aspect of our operation we have a fundamental belief that client success translates to business success for Sharp Notions. And we believe in sharing our success with employees, our most valued asset, and giving back to the local markets we serve.
